name: Ronit Ranjan Tripathy
college: Noida Institute Of Engineering and Technology

full_output.summary: A strong, aspiring B.Tech CSE (AIML) graduate equipped with self-possessed fundamentals of AI/ML, cryptography, and cybersecurity; front-end development and real-time software with computer vision. Looking for an internship or entry-level opportunity that puts my machine learning engineering or full-stack development skills into action. Ready to work upon and make a difference with cutting-edge projects, driving technological advancements.

education.school: Noida Institute Of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: CrossBorder Transaction through Cryptography
projects.description: Introduced our own cryptocurrency named cross-coin. Made a website for the users where they perform transactions.

projects.name: CyberSecurity Based Phishing Detection
projects.description: Enabled users to stay protected from phishing domains. Can check phishing through screenshots and mailing boxes. Provided the score of the URLs and can check spam mails. Developed a web extension to alert users if they click on a phishing domain by mistake.

projects.name: Sign Language Recognition using ML
projects.description: Detection and recognition of hand sign language (Alphabets) using OpenCV and CNN.

projects.name: VR Technology to Understand about Eclipse
projects.description: Virtual Reality that makes teenagers understand about eclipse in an interactive way. Developed a website that provides information about this.

projects.name: Wise-O-Bot (A ChatBot)
projects.description: Utilizes Generative Pretrained Transformers. Provides personalized advice and emulates celebrities' tone and humor. Blends technology, empathy, and entertainment for a unique experience.

projects.name: Drowsiness Detection and Alarming System
projects.description: Created an ML model that detects if the driver is alert or drowsy. Model accuracy is 98%. Created using Python and OpenCV. Generates a loud sound if the driver is drowsy.

full_output.name: Ronit Ranjan Tripathy
achievements_and_awards: Finished 4th in Intelx Awiros Appathon2.0 (Indias largest computer vision hackathon).
Top 8 in NASA Space App Challenge 2023 (District level).
Published research paper as an author: "Enhancing Waste Management Through Object Detection and Recyclable Material Classification," EAI SUS-DEV2023.
Currently working on the patent of ADAM
